table_name.create: r_build_id string, id string, deal_room_num string, contract_no string, contract_time string, visited_time string, reception string, amount decimal(15,2), amount_old decimal(15,2), deal_area decimal(15,2), cooperation_mode int, status int, is_consignee int, is_contract_final int, is_money_settleup int, contract_name_rsa string, contract_name_md5 string, contract_identity_card_rsa string, contract_identity_card_md5 string, contract_phone_rsa string, contract_phone_md5 string, contract_address_rsa string, contract_address_md5 string, visited_name_rsa string, visited_name_md5 string, visited_phone_rsa string, visited_phone_md5 string, objective int, relation string, deal_suits int, income decimal(15,2), income_old decimal(15,2), family string, loan_type int, payment_time string, marital_status int, feedback string, service_amount_state decimal(15,2), service_amount_state_old decimal(15,2), developer_invoice_id bigint, client_source int, lifecycle_id string, creater string, current_status int, create_time string, create_time_old string, recheck_user string, recheck_mark string, deal_review_status int, subscribe_time string, contractGUID string, update_time string, broker_id string, guid string, lifecycle_rb_id string, sync_time string, building_rb_id bigint, building_name string
table_name.select: (select r_build_id,id,deal_room_num,contract_no,contract_time, visited_time,reception,amount, amount_old, deal_area, cooperation_mode,status,is_consignee, is_contract_final,is_money_settleup, contract_name,contract_identity_card, contract_phone,contract_address,visited_name, visited_phone,objective,relation,deal_suits, income, income_old, family,loan_type,payment_time,marital_status, feedback,service_amount_state, service_amount_state_old, developer_invoice_id, client_source,lifecycle_id,creater,current_status, create_time, create_time_old, recheck_user,recheck_mark,deal_review_status, subscribe_time,contractGUID,update_time,broker_id, guid,lifecycle_rb_id,sync_time,building_rb_id, building_name from client_building_sale) spark_sql_client_building_sale
